docs.snippet: This Joint Personnel Recovery Agency Draft Exploitation Plan was recently obtained by The New York Times after being declassified in a legal case by former detainees against former Central Intelligence Agency contractors. The plan proposed that a ...
docs.lead_paragraph: This Joint Personnel Recovery Agency Draft Exploitation Plan was recently obtained by The New York Times after being declassified in a legal case by former detainees against former Central Intelligence Agency contractors. The plan proposed that a secret military interrogation facility be created, similar to secret C.I.A. prisons that were actually operated.
